com.iciql

Class QueryBetween<T,A>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iciql.QueryBetween<T,A>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the return type of the query
    A - the incomplete condition data type

    public class QueryBetween<T,A>
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a "between y and z" condition.
